entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of drizzle or flurries near noon. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 5 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 12 February 2023
